measurement won''t auto-track them. Send the standard file_download
event manually alongside the custom app_download event.

EOF
\)")

Bash(tgit commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add animated terminal hero with sequenced step transitions

Replace static terminal screenshots with CSS-animated terminal that
types out commands with blinking cursor. Three steps cycle through:
1. echo "Hello World" >> data.txt
2. git add .
3. git commit -m "add data"

Each step shows terminal typing, then arrow pulses, then mainscreen
crossfades. After all steps, showcase phase zooms final result.
Renamed step images to step1a/1b, step2a/2b, step3a/3b convention.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
